scripts.build:node: npm install --omit=dev && mkdir -p dist/node-layer/nodejs && cp -R node_modules dist/node-layer/nodejs
scripts.sam:deploy: sam deploy --no-confirm-changeset --no-fail-on-empty-changeset --profile aws-playground-service-account --resolve-s3 --stack-name aws-sam-powertools --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region eu-central-1
scripts.deploy: npm install && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:node && npm run sam:deploy
